title: JavaScript Level 10 â€” Problem Solving with Objects & Arrays
intro: This level combines arrays, objects and loops to solve slightly bigger problems.
points: Use objects as frequency maps to count occurrences of values.
Combine arrays and objects to store structured data.
Sort or iterate in a specific order when printing outputs.
Carefully design input-output formats for coding problems.
Develop a problem-solving approach: read, think, plan, then code.
